original_text: but the Israelites were exceedingly fruitful; they multiplied greatly, increased in numbers and became so numerous that the land was filled with them.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손은 생육하고 불어나 번성하고 매우 강하여 온 땅에 가득하게 되었더라

sentences.original_text: but the Israelites were exceedingly fruitful
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이스라엘 사람들은 매우 열매가 맺혔고

sentences.original_text: that the land was filled with them
